com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils.nbt

Class EntityNBTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils.nbt.EntityNBTUtil

  • public class EntityNBTUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility to modify Entities NBT-tags. Uses reflection and scans through all methods to find the right ones, so it might change in future releases.

    The methods must only be called when at least one world is loaded, as it needs to spawn a sample entity (ArmorStand).
    It will be enforced by throwing an IllegalStateException.


    DISCLAIMER:
    Doesn't allow for the addition of new tags. You can modify the tags of the TileEntity, but not add new ones. This is a limitation of minecraft.

      • appendNbtTag

        public static void appendNbtTag(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                NBTWrappers.NBTTagCompound compound)
        Appends the NBTWrappers.NBTTagCompound to the entities NBT tag, overwriting already set values
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity whose NbtTag to change
        compound - The NBTWrappers.NBTTagCompound whose values you want to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if entity or compound is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a critical, non recoverable error occurred earlier (loading methods).
